name: Configuration for Alpha Ess
headerDisplay: Please [read the documentation](https://github.com/zerwuff/homebridge-alphaess) of the plugin for more informations and step by step instructions on how to configure it.

alphaUrl.title: Alpha ESS OpenAPI Url
alphaUrl.description: The Alpha ESS OPEN API URL

appid.title: App Id
appid.description: The Alpha ESS OPEN API appId

appsecret.title: App Secret
appsecret.description: The alpha ESS OPEN API appSecret

serialnumber.title: serialnumber
serialnumber.description: The Alpha ESS Serial number, eg. AE....

powerLoadingThreshold.title: power threshold
powerLoadingThreshold.description: The pv power threshold to enable the trigger

powerLoadingThresholdSecondsLower.title: time threshold down -> up
powerLoadingThresholdSecondsLower.description: The number of seconds of the power threshold required to trigger from down -> up

powerLoadingThresholdSecondsUpper.title: time threshold up -> down
powerLoadingThresholdSecondsUpper.description: The number of seconds of the power threshold required to trigger from up -> down

socLoadingThreshold.title: socLoadingThreshold
socLoadingThreshold.description: The battery SOC threshold to enable the trigger

refreshTimerInterval.title: refreshTimerInterval
refreshTimerInterval.description: The refresh timer interval in ms to update system values

mqtt_trigger_topic_true.title: mqtt_trigger_topic_true
mqtt_trigger_topic_true.description: the mqtt topic to use when trigger is true

mqtt_trigger_topic_false.title: mqtt_trigger_topic_false
mqtt_trigger_topic_false.description: the mqtt topic to use when trigger is false

mqtt_trigger_message_true.title: mqtt_trigger_message_true
mqtt_trigger_message_true.description: the mqtt message to use when trigger is true

mqtt_trigger_message_false.title: mqtt_trigger_message_false
mqtt_trigger_message_false.description: the mqtt message to use when trigger is false

mqtt_status_topic.title: mqtt_status_topic
mqtt_status_topic.description: the mqtt status topic name to send alpha ess status data (soc, power)

power_image_filename.title: power_image_filename
power_image_filename.description: the filename where power image is rendered to

tibberLoadBatteryEnabled.title: Enable Battery loading w/ tibber
tibberLoadBatteryEnabled.description: Enable loading of the battery when lowest price or highest point is met yes / no

tibberLoadingMinutes.title: Tibber Battery Loading Time (Minutes)
tibberLoadingMinutes.description: When in loading mode, number of minutes to load the battery

tibberThresholdSOC.title: Tibber SOC Threshold
tibberThresholdSOC.description: the battery SOC threshold that is required to trigger tibber loading. if below with price, loading is triggerd.

tibberThresholdEur.title: Tibber difference threshold in euro
tibberThresholdEur.description: The diff to the lowest price that is acceptable to trigger tibber loading. eg. daily tibber minimum = 0.20 , this value = 0.02, trigger is fired at 0.22

tibberThresholdTotalEur.title: Tibber absolute lower threshold in eur (lower trigger limit)
tibberThresholdTotalEur.description: The absolute max price of tibber that is acceptable to trigger battery loading. This wins over tibber difference threshold. Idea: Pump into battery with low prices.

tibberThresholdMaxEur.title: Tibber absolute upper threshold in eur (upper trigger limit)
tibberThresholdMaxEur.description: The absolute max price of tibber needs to be reached to trigger battery loading. This wins over tibber difference threshold. Eg: daily price between 0.40-0.60 , this value = 0.50, trigger is fired each time price is over 0.50. Idea: Protect from high energy prices

tibberDischargeDisabled.title: Disable Battery Discharge during tibber loading
tibberDischargeDisabled.description: During tibber charge, prevent discharge of the battery, to save battery life and money

triggerImageFilename.title: Trigger Image Filename
triggerImageFilename.description: The filename where the alpha and tibber trigger image is rendered to

layout.title: Alpha Trigger Settings
layout.description: Reaching this settings will open the sensor, mostly to trigger automation
